title: @riot help!! doodle for RP (Illaoi Idol drawing)

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Now that my shop is open, I got some juicy offers, but sadly my maths were not up to the task and I felt 36 rp short of my ravenborn lb :'(. For this is that I offer my most precious drawing: Illaoi's idol made in my tablet :D

if this is possible my summoner name is santaIsNotReal (LAN server)

replies.body: Oooooo that's a nice kraken idol! Refresh you client, and you should see your new RP total the next time you login ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XxBRNiPT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-20T00:05:32.075+0000)
>
> Oooooo that's a nice kraken idol! Refresh you client, and you should see your new RP total the next time you login ^_^!

Thanks a lot! you are the real MVP !!!
(now, if you can pitch a illaoi skin for me would be awesome hahaha ;) )
Yoooooo Illaoi is actually my main, you don't even know how badly I've been wanting another skin for her xD

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XxBRNiPT,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-20T01:02:24.505+0000)
>
> Yoooooo Illaoi is actually my main, you don't even know how badly I've been wanting another skin for her xD

you and me both, brother :)
But seriously though, we will get a new skin eventually right???
